casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Keith MARTIN No. 2018-KH-578 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 6, 2019 ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT, PARISH OF CADDO Writ denied. HUGHES, J., additionally concurs and assigns reasons. CRICHTON, J., recused.

Hughes, J., additionally concurs.

I concur with the denial of the writ while noting that the court of appeal transferred this matter to the trial court to consider the request for documents. If the transcript supports relator's contentions that the prosecutor infringed upon his right to remain silent, he may reurge that claim.
